answers.answer: Well, mine will consist on checking my c-section, making sure it all has healed well, my weight, and blood pressure.   I will also get a blood test to make sure I dont have gest. diabetes anymore.  Im also getting my mirena iud and a couple of weeks later a pap smear. I think thats about it!

The doctor checked my uterus to make sure everything had gone back to normal size.  He also checked my stiches (natural birth with a LOT of tearing!!!).  I was weighed and he talked to me about birth control options, etc...It was a pretty quick visit!  :)

My c-section site was checked, blood pressure, weight, breast exam, and I also got a PAP done (counts as my annual exam). My doctor talked to me a lot about birth control options, including options to take while breastfeeding. Thats pretty much it!

They do a pap smear and if you had stitches they check those. They weigh you, check your blood pressure. It's basically the same as your first prenatal visit. They'll also want you to ask any questions about being a mother, bring up any depression or anxiety, ask how you're eating, etc.
they checked my c-section weighed me checked to see if uterus was back to normal

question: i havent had any check up after i delievered my daughter , what does it consists of ? what kindda of tests?thank you
title: What does a 6 wks check-up consists of?( after birth)
